formulas.expression: IF( LEN(TEXT({!calc.total_down_payment_amount__c})) > 15, LEFT(TEXT({!calc.total_down_payment_amount__c}), LEN(TEXT({!calc.total_down_payment_amount__c})) - 15) & "." & MID(TEXT({!calc.total_down_payment_amount__c}), LEN(TEXT({!calc.total_down_payment_amount__c})) - formulas.name: Frm10
formulas.expression: {!calc.admin_fee__c} + {!calc.santunan_insurance_premium__c}

formulas.name: Frm8
formulas.expression: ABS({!calc.reverse_otr__c} - {!calc.total_down_payment_amount__c})

formulas.name: Frm9
formulas.expression: {!Frm10} + {!calc.provision_fee__c} + {!calc.asset_insurance_premium__c} + {!calc.life_insurance_premium__c}

formulas.name: TodayDateTime
formulas.expression: TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) & " " & CASE(MONTH(TODAY()), 1, "Januari", 2, "Februari", 3, "Maret", 4, "April", 5, "Mei", 6, "Juni", 7, "Juli", 8, "Agustus", 9, "September", 10, "Oktober", 11, "November", 12, "Desember", "") & " " & TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))
